summary: TL*  THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 CHEVROLET CRUZE.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER: 14V151000 (POWER TRAIN).  WHEN THE CONTACT ATTEMPTED TO SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT TO HAVE THE VEHICLE REPAIRED, THE DEALER STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE.  THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED AND HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE.    UPDATED 10/23/14*CN       THE CONSUMER STATED THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. UPDATED 4/16/2015 *JS
